messages.id: Using this form, you can manage alternative urls for an item. This is an easy way to make an item available under two different URLs.
messages.defaultMessage: Using this form, you can manage alternative urls for an item. This is an easy way to make an item available under two different URLs.

messages.id: Enter the absolute path where the alternative url should exist. The path must start with '/'. Only urls that result in a 404 not found page will result in a redirect occurring.
messages.defaultMessage: Enter the absolute path where the alternative url should exist. The path must start with '/'. Only urls that result in a 404 not found page will result in a redirect occurring.

messages.id: Alternative url path must start with a slash.
messages.defaultMessage: Alternative url path must start with a slash.

messages.id: The provided alternative url already exists!
messages.defaultMessage: The provided alternative url already exists!

messages.id: Existing alternative urls for this item
messages.defaultMessage: Existing alternative urls for this item
